string.text: They're not alone—more ahead!
Hold up! I see more of them!
Shit! Reinforcements incoming!
Keep sharp! They're bringing friends!
More targets spotted! Stay low!
They're flanking us—move!
We've got company—lots of it!
Stay on your toes! They're closing in!
They're surrounding us—don't get pinned down!
Ambush! More of them, dead ahead!
Looks like they're hunting in packs. Stay alert!
We've got more eyes on us. Careful now!
Shit—it's not just one squad!
They're moving in groups. Don't get caught out!
I count more... Maybe too many!
They're working together—this just got worse.
Careful! They're spreading out to corner us!
Another wave—hold them back!
Damn it—they're multiplying!
We're not alone. More footsteps in the dark.
They're closing in fast—stay sharp!
It's not just us and him—there's more out there.
More shadows moving—eyes open!
This isn't a fair fight—more on their side.
Listen! I hear more of them nearby.
Reinforcements? Just our luck!
We've got ourselves a crowd now.
They're multiplying like rats—watch it!
He's not fighting alone. I see more ahead.
Spread out—they're coming from all sides!
It's never just one. Prepare yourself!
They're regrouping—this won't end well.
Careful! They've got numbers on their side.
More footsteps—can't tell how many!
Sounds like a whole squad is moving in!
Backup's here—and it's not for us!
It's a damned hornet's nest out there!
We're walking into a crowd—stay low!
That's too many for comfort. Watch your back.
They're calling for help—this isn't over.
I've got a bad feeling... There's more out there.
One's a distraction—there are more behind him!
Too quiet... They're regrouping somewhere.
It's not just him; they're hunting in packs.
Can't take them all head-on—think fast!
More enemies—this just got worse.
Their numbers are growing. We need to move!
Stay calm! More incoming from the left!
We've stumbled into a nest. They're everywhere!
They've got the upper hand—too many of them!
I'm seeing movement—too much of it.
They're surrounding us. Hold your ground!
This isn't a skirmish anymore—it's a fight for survival.
Another wave's coming—brace yourself!
We're outnumbered. This might get ugly!
Enemies closing in—every direction!
They're swarming us. Move fast, think faster!
More in the shadows—they're waiting for their moment!
Don't let them box us in!
There's too many of them—we'll have to fight smart!
They're closing ranks—watch for a charge!
It's more than we bargained for. Stay alert!
Keep your head on a swivel—they're everywhere!
Too many to count. Don't get overwhelmed!
We're in deep now—they've got us outgunned.
Watch your sides! They're spreading out!
They're trying to outflank us. Stay mobile!
More coming in from the distance—keep an eye out!
They've got us surrounded—no easy way out.
Looks like we kicked the hornet's nest.
This isn't just a patrol—they're organized!
Another group on the horizon—they've spotted us!
Hold your ground! They're coming in fast!
It's an infestation out here. Stay vigilant!
Too many to face head-on. We need to outmaneuver them!
They're regrouping—something's not right.
More movement in the trees. Stay frosty!
They've spotted us—fall back or fight!
More signals incoming—they're converging on us!
Looks like they've got reinforcements on standby.
More targets incoming! Stay steady!
They're creeping closer. Keep your wits about you.
We're about to be overwhelmed—think fast!
They're coming in waves—stay strong!
Movement behind us—watch your back!
This fight isn't over. They've got more in reserve!
They're swarming the area—don't let them close in!
Their numbers are growing by the second!
They're calling for reinforcements. Get ready!
It's not safe here—too many hostile eyes.
More boots on the ground—stay hidden!
The odds just got worse. Brace yourself!
Watch out—they've got us in their sights!
More signatures closing in fast!
This isn't just a fight—it's a damn war zone now!
We're surrounded—pick your targets wisely!
They're out there, waiting for the right moment.
It's not just one wave—they're coming in layers.
We've been spotted! They're converging on us!
More movement out there—this isn't going to end quickly.
It looks like a military stalker has found us!
There's a soldier nearby! He may have spotted us while on patrol.
It's the Military! Shoot to kill! They rarely bother arresting stalkers like they're supposed to.
A military hound has spotted us - likely scouting the area for his squad.
Spetsnaz!? One of Kuznetsov's enforcers, no doubt.
I think it's a soldier doing reconnaissance.
Military spotted! Stay low and don't let them see you.
Shit! It's the army—let's not give them an excuse to open fire.
Soldier ahead! You know how this ends if they see us.
Military patrol! We're in their sights now.
They've got the advantage. It's the damn army!
Military boots on the ground. We need to stay sharp!
Soldier spotted. Don't let him radio for backup.
It's a soldier. Probably here to remind us we're not welcome.
Great, the army's here. Let's hope it's not a whole squad.
Military dog on patrol—he's probably not alone.
Army ahead. They'll shoot first and bury us later.
Careful! That's a soldier. They don't take prisoners.
Military presence here? What are they sniffing around for?
It's a government dog. He's probably scouting for trouble.
A soldier's on our trail. Keep quiet and stay hidden.
Military eyes are on us. Move carefully.
They've sent the army in again. Something's brewing.
Army ahead! Don't give them a reason to unload on us.
Another military patrol—let's not stick around.
Military spotted! They won't hesitate to gun us down.
Army scum out here again. We'll need to move fast.
Looks like a lone soldier, but where's the rest?
The military's sniffing around again. Keep your weapon ready.
Soldier sighted! I bet his squad's not far behind.
Another lapdog of the state—don't let him call for backup!
Government muscle ahead. We'll need to tread carefully.
Military spotted. They'll shoot to kill if they see us.
That's the military for you—always watching, always shooting.
Careful, soldier up ahead. He'll be calling the shots.
Looks like Kuznetsov's boys are out and about again.
Army presence detected. That's never a good sign.
A soldier's patrol just crossed paths with us—watch yourself.
Spetsnaz sighted! We're in deep trouble now.
Military's out in force. Something's going down.
Another army dog sniffing around. Let's make it quick.
A soldier's patrol just passed through here. Let's move.
Military presence? Damn, they never quit, do they?
Looks like the Zone isn't quiet enough for them anymore.
Military spotted! No time for second thoughts—act now!
Careful, those soldiers will shoot anything that moves.
State dogs are out again. Better stay out of their sight.
Spotted a soldier. Let's hope he's as blind as his bosses.
Military presence confirmed—this just got a lot riskier.
Soldier up ahead. I doubt he's here to chat.
It's just a bandit.
I think it's a bandit. Some punk looking for an easy score if I had to guess.
Is that a bandit? Those assholes killed my friend. I'm coming for you!
Looks like one of Sultan's spineless bastards.
It's... heh. No worries. It's just some thieving rat from Dark Valley.
A bandit? Typical scum looking for a handout—or a corpse to loot.
It's a bandit. Those bastards are everywhere these days.
Looks like some wannabe tough guy from Garbage. Easy pickings.
Another bandit. Let's show him what happens when you mess with stalkers.
Bandit scum—looks like he hasn't bathed in weeks.
Sultan's dogs are out again. Let's see if they can bark without teeth.
Another rat crawled out of the Dark Valley. Let's put him back in the dirt.
Just a bandit—probably dreaming about vodka and easy loot.
Bandit spotted. Bet he's got more friends hiding around here.
One of Sultan's lackeys, no doubt. Time to remind him who runs this Zone.
A thug from Garbage, by the looks of it. They always think they're invincible.
Bandit ahead! Watch your pockets—and your back.
It's a bandit. Let's see how tough he is without his gang.
Ugh, another lowlife from the swamps. Bet he smells like them too.
That's a bandit if I've ever seen one—cheap gun and an attitude to match.
Bandits. Cockroaches of the Zone—kill one, and ten more show up.
Sultan must be scraping the bottom of the barrel with this one.
Another bandit. He'd sell his own mother for a handful of rubles.
It's a bandit. Let's show him the Zone doesn't tolerate freeloaders.
That bandit looks drunk—or just stupid. Maybe both.
More bandit filth. They're like weeds—you can't get rid of them.
A lone bandit? Hah! He's either brave or really, really stupid.
Looks like some bandit scrounging for scraps. Let's take him out.
A bandit? Heh, I've seen rats with more courage.
It's a bandit. Thinks the Zone owes him a favor, no doubt.
Bandit ahead. Let's see if he's as tough as he thinks he is.
Another thug from Dark Valley. Same stink, same attitude.
Bandit sighted. Let's hope he's not smart enough to run.
Typical bandit scum. Bet he's dreaming of a big score.
Looks like a bandit. No honor, no brain, no future.
Bandit filth ahead. Let's clean up the Zone a little.
Is that a bandit? Easy prey if you ask me.
Sultan's dogs never stray far from the pack. Keep an eye out for more.
Looks like one of Sultan's errand boys. Let's send him back in pieces.
Bandit scum. Probably thought today would be easy. Wrong.
A bandit? Let's see if he bleeds like the others.
Another rat from Dark Valley. Nothing but trouble.
That bandit looks like he's itching for a fight. Let's give him one.
It's just a bandit. Doesn't mean he's not dangerous.
Another thief who thinks the Zone owes him something. Pathetic.
Bandit spotted. Easy to kill, but harder to forget their stink.
Sultan's boys are out again. Let's thin the herd.
A thug from the Garbage. No doubt hoping for an easy mark.
Bandit ahead. Let's show him who really owns the Zone.
That's a bandit if I've ever seen one. Filth in human form.
It's Clear Sky.
I think it's a Clear Sky member. Did the Renegades chase them out?
If I had to guess, it's a goose from the swamps. Are they lost?
Is that Clear Sky? They've been quiet for some time now.
I see of those Clear Sky members. Think they grew tired of the swamps?
Clear Sky? They don't usually stray far from their precious swamps.
A Clear Sky stalker? Rare to see one out in the open like this.
That's Clear Sky all right. Wonder what they're doing so far from home.
Clear Sky? Thought they'd all disappeared by now.
Looks like one of those swamp-dwellers from Clear Sky.
Clear Sky? Haven't seen one of them in a long time.
A Clear Sky member? What are they doing so far from the swamps?
That's Clear Sky for sure. Looks like they're exploring again.
Clear Sky in the wild? Guess the swamps weren't exciting enough.
One of Clear Sky's scientists, maybe? They always had their heads in the clouds.
Is that Clear Sky? Haven't heard from them since the swamps went quiet.
Clear Sky. Always trying to understand the Zone while everyone else just survives it.
Looks like Clear Sky's still around. Thought the Zone had swallowed them whole.
Clear Sky? Hah, those swamp rats must be feeling brave today.
A Clear Sky stalker? Guess the swamps weren't enough to keep them busy.
That's Clear Sky, no doubt. Wonder if they're still obsessed with “understanding” the Zone.
Clear Sky out here? Either they're lost or they've got a death wish.
Haven't seen Clear Sky outside the swamps in years. What's going on?
Clear Sky? Guess they're still clinging to their idealistic dreams.
Clear Sky's out and about? Must mean trouble is brewing somewhere.
That's a Clear Sky stalker. Wonder if they've made any progress with their research.
Clear Sky? Thought the Zone had wiped them out by now.
Clear Sky's been laying low for so long. Why show up now?
A Clear Sky member? Always poking around where they don't belong.
Is that Clear Sky? Must be desperate to come this far from the swamps.
Clear Sky? Thought they'd given up on their little crusade by now.
That's Clear Sky for sure. They're always after something mysterious.
Clear Sky out here? Must be something big to draw them out of hiding.
Clear Sky? What's next, Monolith planting flowers?
Looks like Clear Sky is still poking around. Some things never change.
That's a Clear Sky stalker. Always thought they were too clever for their own good.
Clear Sky? Didn't expect to see one so far from their swamp.
Is that Clear Sky? Wonder what they've dug up this time.
Clear Sky? Never thought I'd see one out of their element.
Looks like Clear Sky still has a few members left. Color me surprised.
Clear Sky in the Zone? They're either brave or incredibly stupid.
That's a Clear Sky stalker, all right. Haven't seen one in ages.
Clear Sky? Looks like they're finally venturing out of their comfort zone.
A Clear Sky member? Guess they haven't given up their quest yet.
Clear Sky? They must be desperate to leave the safety of the swamps.
That's Clear Sky. Still chasing their dream of “understanding” the Zone, I bet.
Clear Sky in the wild? What are they looking for this time?
Clear Sky? Maybe they've finally decided to get their hands dirty.
That's Clear Sky. Haven't seen one since the Renegades tore them apart.
A Clear Sky stalker? Wonder if they'll talk or just keep to themselves.
It's Duty.
Appears to be a member of Duty. Assholes...
I think it's a Dutyer. Who made them policemen of the Zone anyways?
We've been spotted by a Duty drone from Rostok. One setback after another shows they aren't invincible.
We're fighting one of those fascist brick walls. Where the hell do they get all that gear?
Duty spotted. Let's hope they're not in one of their moods.
It's a Duty soldier. Always sticking their noses where they don't belong.
Duty again. Bet they're here to tell us how we're “ruining” the Zone.
A Dutyer? Great, just what we needed—more rules and lectures.
Duty ahead. Wonder if they're lost or just looking for trouble.
Looks like a Duty grunt. They're always so damn serious.
Duty? Wonder if they'll try to boss us around this time.
Another Dutyer. Always marching in like they own the place.
Duty patrol spotted. Better watch yourself—they don't play nice.
Duty's here again. Probably on one of their crusades against Freedom.
A member of Duty? Let's hope they're in a forgiving mood today.
Duty scum spotted. Wonder how many speeches they've got ready.
It's a Dutyer. Probably thinks he's saving the world or something.
Duty? Guess they're here to “protect” us again.
That's a Duty soldier. Always so self-righteous, aren't they?
Duty spotted. Looks like they're itching for a fight.
Duty grunt ahead. Let's not give him a reason to draw that rifle.
Another Dutyer. Probably thinks he's doing us all a favor just by existing.
Duty patrol? Must be here to “protect humanity” or whatever they preach.
It's Duty. Let's keep moving before they start asking questions.
Duty ahead. Just what we need—more military types breathing down our necks.
A Dutyer. Let's see if he's as tough as the uniform makes him look.
Duty member spotted. Probably off to play hero somewhere.
Duty soldier? Guess he didn't get the memo about minding his own business.
Duty spotted. Bet he's got a whole squad nearby.
It's one of Duty's lapdogs. Wonder who they're chasing this time.
Duty soldier sighted. Always ready to lecture you while pointing a gun at your face.
Looks like a Dutyer. They never seem to mind their own business, do they?
Duty grunt spotted. Let's hope he's not in a trigger-happy mood.
Duty? Guess they're out patrolling for Freedom members again.
A Dutyer? They act like they own the Zone.
Duty presence here? Must mean they're on one of their holy missions.
Duty spotted. Probably out hunting anomalies or stalkers—they don't care which.
Duty grunt ahead. Always more interested in control than survival.
That's Duty, all right. Tough, well-equipped, and as annoying as ever.
Duty soldier spotted. Wonder if he'll demand we “fall in line.”
Looks like one of Duty's poster boys. Always ready to play the hero.
Duty ahead. Let's keep our distance—they've got itchy trigger fingers.
Duty presence confirmed. Bet they're gearing up for another fight with Freedom.
It's a Dutyer. Wonder if he's lost or just out to prove something.
Duty spotted. Let's hope they're not looking for a reason to flex their authority.
Another Duty soldier. Always ready to turn the Zone into their personal warzone.
Duty sighted. They're always looking for someone to boss around.
That's a Duty soldier. Best to avoid getting into an argument—or a firefight.
Duty patrol spotted. Probably here to remind us who's “in charge.”
It's an Ecologist.
Look, one of those pencil pushers!
We've stumbled into a field researcher from Yantar.
Hah! It's one of Sakharov's assistants! I wonder what he's found for us?
Ecologist spotted! Be careful, some might be cowards but they're all more clever than you might think.
It's an Ecologist. Bet he's cataloging anomalies again.
Another lab coat out in the wild. Wonder how long he'll last?
Ecologist sighted. Must be looking for artifacts or trouble—or both.
That's one of the scientists. Probably documenting another anomaly.
It's an Ecologist. Guess they've crawled out of their lab again.
Looks like one of Sakharov's field researchers. Let's hope he brought backup.
Ecologist ahead. They always look out of place in the Zone.
It's one of those lab rats. Bet he's here for readings, not survival.
An Ecologist? Out here alone? That's brave—or stupid.
It's an Ecologist. Always chasing knowledge in a place where it kills you.
That's one of the scientists. Let's hope he's got something interesting to share.
Ecologist spotted. These guys are always in the wrong place at the wrong time.
One of the Yantar crew. Always taking notes while the rest of us fight for our lives.
That's an Ecologist. Probably studying something he shouldn't be.
Ecologist in the wild? Bet he's regretting it already.
One of Sakharov's assistants. Always more curious than cautious.
That's an Ecologist. Wonder if he'll pay for any artifacts we've found?
Looks like an Ecologist. They're always poking around where they don't belong.
An Ecologist? Out here? Must be desperate for data.
That's an Ecologist. Bet he's running some experiment the Zone will ruin.
It's one of those scientists. The Zone eats their kind for breakfast.
Ecologist spotted. Must have wandered out of Yantar.
One of the lab coats. Bet he's hoping to avoid the real dangers out here.
It's an Ecologist. Always too smart for their own good.
That's an Ecologist. They're more fragile than their equipment.
Ecologist sighted. I hope he knows what he's walking into.
One of those pencil pushers again. Let's see what he's up to.
It's an Ecologist. They're always chasing the Zone's secrets.
That's an Ecologist. Hope he's got a good payday for us if he needs help.
Looks like an Ecologist. They've got brains, but not much else.
One of Sakharov's crew. They never seem to know what danger really looks like.
Ecologist ahead. Wonder what anomaly he's chasing today?
It's an Ecologist. They think data will save them. It won't.
Ecologist in sight. They're more trouble than they're worth sometimes.
That's one of those scientists. Always poking and prodding at things they don't understand.
Looks like a scientist. Wonder how many Duty soldiers he's got babysitting him?
Ecologist spotted. They're probably cataloging anomalies again.
It's an Ecologist. They always seem so out of place here.
An Ecologist? He's braver than most, but probably not by choice.
That's an Ecologist. They should stick to Yantar where it's safe.
Ecologist spotted. Wonder what he's hoping to find out here.
It's a scientist. Must be hoping the Zone doesn't notice him.
Looks like an Ecologist. Always curious, always fragile.
That's one of Sakharov's people. Hope he's not in over his head.
An Ecologist in the Zone? Let's hope his curiosity doesn't get him killed.
Freedom ahead!
It's a Freedomer. Hopefully he's too high to shoot straight.
One of those Barrier pot heads, just ahead.
I found an anarchist from the warehouses. What do they want with us?
Freedom. You think they'll have anything good left once we take care of them?
Freedom spotted. Hope they're not here to cause trouble.
It's a Freedomer. Probably just looking for a good time—or a fight.
Freedom ahead. They're either too relaxed or too ready to shoot.
Looks like one of Freedom's anarchists. Let's see what they're up to.
Freedom spotted! Better keep an eye on them—they're unpredictable.
A Freedomer. They're always so loud about “freedom” this and “oppression” that.
It's one of Freedom's “revolutionaries.” Wonder if they even know what they're fighting for anymore.
Freedom patrol spotted. Let's hope they're in a good mood today.
A Freedomer. Probably just finished smoking something questionable.
Freedom scum. Always talking big about “liberty” while raiding our camps.
Looks like a Freedom stalker. Wonder if they've got any artifacts to trade.
Freedom's here. Guess they're taking a break from arguing with Duty.
It's Freedom. Let's hope they're too high to aim properly.
Freedom spotted. Always the loudest group in the Zone.
A Freedom anarchist. Probably here to “liberate” someone's stash.
It's a Freedomer. Thinks the Zone owes him something, no doubt.
Freedom patrol spotted. Let's hope they're more interested in partying than fighting.
Looks like a Freedom stalker. Probably on his way to argue with Duty again.
Freedom? They're just here for the chaos—or the weed.
One of Freedom's potheads. Let's see if he's more talk than action.
It's Freedom. Always so proud of themselves for doing nothing productive.
Freedom ahead. Let's hope they don't feel like playing hero today.
A Freedomer. They're usually more bark than bite, but don't underestimate them.
Freedom spotted. Always chasing anarchy while the rest of us just survive.
Freedom scum. Thinks their chaos makes the Zone better somehow.
Looks like one of Freedom's misfits. Probably just out for a stroll—or a brawl.
Freedom patrol. Let's see if they're here to talk or fight.
Freedomers. Always quick to claim the Zone's theirs, never willing to defend it properly.
It's Freedom. Guess they're taking a break from their eternal war with Duty.
A Freedomer. Wonder if he's sober enough to be dangerous.
Freedom stalker ahead. Let's see if he wants to trade—or start something.
Freedom spotted. Always the first to talk big and the last to back it up.
Freedom scum ahead. Guess we'll see if they're feeling brave today.
Freedom patrol spotted. Wonder if they've got anything worth taking.
That's a Freedomer. They always look like they just woke up.
It's Freedom. Let's see if they're here to spread their “liberty” nonsense again.
Freedom ahead. Always acting like they've got nothing to lose.
One of Freedom's misfits. Let's see what they're up to.
Freedom spotted. Guess we'll find out if they're friends or foes today.
It's Freedom. Always chasing their own twisted version of “freedom.”
A Freedom stalker. They're usually chill, but don't push your luck.
Freedomers ahead. Better watch our backs just in case.
That's Freedom. Wonder if they've come to preach or plunder today.
Freedom patrol. They're probably not expecting much of a fight.
Freedom scum. Always talking peace, but ready to pull the trigger.
It's a Sin cultist!
It's Monolith's best friend - Sin.
A... wait. The stories, they're true? Sin... they're real?
W-who is that? I... think... think we should run. Run! I've a terrible feeling about this!
Shit! Sin! Hold nothing back! Fight! Fight for your life my friend!
Sin... I thought they were just a rumor.
It's them. Sin. Stay sharp, or you won't live to tell the tale.
Sin cultists. They shouldn't exist... and yet here they are.
They're real. Sin is real. Damn it, we're in deep now.
Sin? Here? This is bad—very bad.
Sin spotted! Don't hold back—they sure won't.
Sin... Those bastards don't belong in the Zone—or anywhere.
It's Sin. I've heard the stories... Let's not join them.
Sin? I didn't think I'd live to see them myself.
Sin ahead. Whatever you do, don't hesitate to shoot.
Sin cultists. Nothing but shadows and death follow them.
That's Sin. Even Monolith fears these psychos.
Sin spotted! Whatever they want, it won't be good for us.
It's Sin... the Zone feels darker just seeing them.
Sin cultists ahead. Watch yourself—they're worse than mutants.
That's Sin. You feel that chill in the air? That's them.
Sin? Guess the Zone wasn't dangerous enough without them.
Sin cultists... what the hell do they even want?
Sin. They don't take prisoners. Fight or die, simple as that.
It's Sin. I hope you've made peace with whatever god you believe in.
Sin ahead. We can't let them get the upper hand.
Sin spotted! Their presence alone makes my skin crawl.
Sin. If the Zone has a true evil, it's them.
They're here. Sin. This place just became hell.
That's Sin. I don't know what they're after, but it's never good.
Sin cultists. They don't talk, they just kill. Be ready.
Sin. It's like staring into the Zone's nightmares.
Sin? You sure? Damn it, this just got worse.
Sin spotted. I'd rather face a pack of Bloodsuckers...
That's Sin. Fight now, or you won't get the chance later.
Sin. These bastards are even worse than the stories make them out to be.
Sin cultists ahead. Whatever they're planning, it can't be good.
Sin? I thought they were just a fairy tale. Guess not.
Sin. Their name alone sends chills down my spine.
It's Sin. Death follows wherever they go.
Sin ahead. Whatever they're doing here, it's nothing good.
Sin spotted! Don't stop shooting until they're all down.
It's Sin. Even the mutants seem to avoid them.
Sin? Damn it, the Zone really does have a sick sense of humor.
Sin cultists. They're here for something, and it's never good.
Sin. The Zone just became twice as deadly.
Sin cultists ahead. We'll need more than luck to survive this.
Sin. Whatever you do, don't let your guard down.
Sin spotted! I'd rather face Monolith any day.
It's Sin. Death incarnate, walking among us.
ISG?
Umm... What's U.N.I.S.G.?
It's an UNISG operative!
I think it's... hmm. I've never seen a patch like that before.
I can't tell, an unknown. I can't identify them! Screw it. I'm shooting first and asking questions later!
UNISG? Those sneaky fucks are still around?
That patch… UNISG! Shit, they don't come here to make friends.
UNISG spotted! Those bastards play dirty—keep your head down!
UNISG? Great, as if we didn't have enough problems in the Zone.
It's UNISG. Those fuckers are worse than bandits when it comes to backstabbing.
That's a UNISG operative. What the hell are they scheming this time?
UNISG? Aren't they supposed to be cleaning up the Zone? What a goddamn joke.
UNISG… well, fuck me sideways. We're in deep now.
That's UNISG. You know, the ones who pretend to be scientists while carrying assault rifles.
UNISG ahead! Watch out—they don't ask questions before shooting.
UNISG? Their handlers must be desperate to send them here.
UNISG spotted. They're not here for sightseeing, that's for damn sure.
UNISG? Those shadowy fucks are always up to something shady.
That patch… UNISG. Stick to cover, or they'll cut us down without hesitation.
UNISG? Fuck me, they're like ghosts with guns. Stay sharp!
Looks like UNISG. Always skulking around where they don't belong.
That's UNISG. Their missions are more classified than Monolith's brainwashing.
UNISG spotted! They don't take prisoners—shoot first or die.
It's UNISG. They always show up when shit's about to hit the fan.
UNISG operatives. Fucking ghosts—they'll kill us before we even see them coming.
UNISG. Bet their bosses don't care how many bodies they leave behind.
That's UNISG. Always playing two sides at once. Trust them? Never.
UNISG ahead. What the hell are they sniffing around for now?
It's UNISG. Cold-blooded killers hiding behind their fancy logos.
UNISG spotted. They'll sell your corpse for science and call it progress.
UNISG? Who invited these covert assholes to the Zone?
That's UNISG. Expect well-trained and well-equipped trouble.
UNISG spotted! Whatever they're after, it's bad news for us.
UNISG? Great. Another mystery group treating us like lab rats.
It's UNISG. They'll gut you just to see how you tick.
UNISG. Those cold-blooded sons of bitches are back.
UNISG spotted. Whatever they're hunting, let's not be it.
UNISG? What fresh hell have we stumbled into this time?
UNISG. I've heard rumors they'll burn the Zone to the ground if it suits them.
That's UNISG. Always scheming, always lethal.
UNISG. The Zone's personal cleanup crew—or so they claim.
UNISG operatives. If they're here, someone's paying them a fortune.
UNISG spotted! Keep your head on a swivel—they're trained killers.
It's UNISG. They don't play nice, and they don't leave survivors.
